translations.hero_content: Get found by new clients wherever you are

translations.desc_about: Learn who we are, our history, and the mission that drives us every day.
translations.desc_services: Explore all our professional services designed to meet your needs.
translations.desc_contact: Contact us for information, support, or a personalized quote.
translations.desc_login: Log in to your account to manage your data and access our services.
translations.desc_signup: Sign up to start using all the features available on our platform.
translations.desc_dashboard: Access your personal area to monitor activities and manage your profile.
translations.desc_preview: Quickly and securely preview private content before publishing.
translations.desc_reset: Reset your password easily and securely to regain access.
translations.desc_update: Update your password to ensure your account's maximum security.
translations.desc_pricing: Discover the available plans: with the Premium plan, you get a dedicated professional page with multiple sections, accessible from your public card in the professionals directory.
translations.desc_search: Discover and connect with top professionals and organizations near you. Use our search engine to quickly find trusted experts in any field.
translations.main_services_description: Indicate up to 3 services you offer and your level of expertise as a percentage.

translations.premium_success_message: Your premium plan has been successfully activated.

translations.hero_content_logged: Manage your online presence in just a few clicks. Ready to continue?
translations.show_preview: Show a preview of your webpage
translations.step_register_description: Register for free and boost your online visibility: show who you are, what you do, and attract new clients.
translations.step_page_description: With a premium account, create a personal page in just a few clicks that brings together all your online contacts: social media, website, email, and more. Perfect to get discovered and tell your story.
translations.network_section_description: Looking for an expert? Use our search engine to connect with professionals from any field.
translations.main_success_case_description: Describe up to 3 successful cases that highlight your expertise.
translations.popup.already_subscribed_description: You already have an active subscription. You can continue using our services without interruption.
